recipes.name: Bob Johnson
recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s.
recipes.ingredients: 400g spaghetti, 300g ground beef, 1 onion, 2 garlic cloves, 400g tomato sauce
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta. Brown beef with onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce. Simmer. Serve over pasta.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s.
recipes.ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan, Caesar dressing
recipes.instructions: Grill chicken. Toss lettuce with dressing. Top with chicken, croutons, and parmesan.
